title: Match History Not Updating?
body: Is anyone else having the issue of match history not uploading, which also means your challenges aren't updating?

replies.body:
Hey Blitz7410,

I've reached out to some folks at Riot, and I'll let you know if there are any updates regarding this situation.

Hey Blitz7410,

NOC posted an update about the issue a few hours ago:
>Network Operations â€“ 4:58 AM
We are aware of issues with match history, end of games stats and Bilgewater rewards progress not working properly. We're currently investigating.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce

> [{quoted}](name=Blitz7410,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=7kmxb4Jx,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-24T08:06:53.485+0000)
>
> Is anyone else having the issue of match history not uploading, which also means your challenges aren't updating?

yeah, having same problem

just a bump, same with me and friends. no match history from 5 or 6 arams. when this gets fixed, it would be nice if i got the first tier from the first 3 games and the second from the latter 3 games.
